summary: A marketplace app for buying and selling animals, similar to OLX, rebranded as 'Animal Pashu Bazar'. Users can post ads with photos, prices (in ₹ Rupee), and descriptions. The app includes search filters by location and category, a chat system between buyers and sellers, and user profile management. The visual theme uses a clean white background with Professional Blue as the primary color for buttons and headers.

Media uploads required for ad photos
Real-time or async chat between buyer and seller per listing
